root.sql: create or replace view v_ass_sell_in_main as select '02' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.IN_STORE_ID, t.IN_STORE_NO, t.OUT_GROUP_ID, t.OUT_HOS_ID, t.OUT_STORE_ID, t.OUT_STORE_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.CREATE_EMP, t.CREATE_DATE, t.AUDIT_EMP, t.AUDIT_DATE, t.STATE, t.NOTE BUS_TYPE_CODE from ASS_SELL_IN_SPECIAL t union all select '03' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.IN_STORE_ID, t.IN_STORE_NO, t.OUT_GROUP_ID, t.OUT_HOS_ID, t.OUT_STORE_ID, t.OUT_STORE_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.CREATE_EMP, t.CREATE_DATE, t.AUDIT_EMP, t.AUDIT_DATE, t.STATE, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_GENERAL t union all select '01' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, null IN_STORE_ID, null IN_STORE_NO, t.OUT_GROUP_ID, t.OUT_HOS_ID, null OUT_STORE_ID, null OUT_STORE_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.CREATE_EMP, t.CREATE_DATE, t.AUDIT_EMP, t.AUDIT_DATE, t.STATE, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_HOUSE t union all select '04' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.IN_STORE_ID, t.IN_STORE_NO, t.OUT_GROUP_ID, t.OUT_HOS_ID, t.OUT_STORE_ID, t.OUT_STORE_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.CREATE_EMP, t.CREATE_DATE, t.AUDIT_EMP, t.AUDIT_DATE, t.STATE, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_OTHER t union all select '05' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.IN_STORE_ID, t.IN_STORE_NO, t.OUT_GROUP_ID, t.OUT_HOS_ID, t.OUT_STORE_ID, t.OUT_STORE_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.CREATE_EMP, t.CREATE_DATE, t.AUDIT_EMP, t.AUDIT_DATE, t.STATE, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_INASSETS t union all select '06' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, null IN_STORE_ID, null IN_STORE_NO, t.OUT_GROUP_ID, t.OUT_HOS_ID, null OUT_STORE_ID, null OUT_STORE_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.CREATE_EMP, t.CREATE_DATE, t.AUDIT_EMP, t.AUDIT_DATE, t.STATE, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_LAND t

sql.desc: 调拨入库明细表表视图

root.sql: create or replace view v_ass_sell_in_detail as select '02' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.ASS_ID, t.ASS_NO, t.ASS_ORI_CARD_NO, t.ASS_BRAND, t.ASS_SPEC, t.ASS_MODEL, t.FAC_ID, t.FAC_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_DETAIL_SPECIAL t union all select '03' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.ASS_ID, t.ASS_NO, t.ASS_ORI_CARD_NO, t.ASS_BRAND, t.ASS_SPEC, t.ASS_MODEL, t.FAC_ID, t.FAC_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_DETAIL_GENERAL t union all select '01' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.ASS_ID, t.ASS_NO, t.ASS_ORI_CARD_NO, '' ASS_BRAND, '' ASS_SPEC, '' ASS_MODEL, null FAC_ID, null FAC_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_DETAIL_HOUSE t union all select '04' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.ASS_ID, t.ASS_NO, t.ASS_ORI_CARD_NO, t.ASS_BRAND, t.ASS_SPEC, t.ASS_MODEL, t.FAC_ID, t.FAC_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_DETAIL_OTHER t union all select '05' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.ASS_ID, t.ASS_NO, t.ASS_ORI_CARD_NO, t.ASS_BRAND, '' ASS_SPEC, '' ASS_MODEL, t.FAC_ID, t.FAC_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_DETAIL_INASSETS t union all select '06' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,t.SELL_IN_NO, t.ASS_ID, t.ASS_NO, t.ASS_ORI_CARD_NO, '' ASS_BRAND, '' ASS_SPEC, '' ASS_MODEL, null FAC_ID, null FAC_NO, t.PRICE, t.ADD_DEPRE, t.ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, t.CUR_MONEY, t.FORE_MONEY, t.NOTE from ASS_SELL_IN_DETAIL_LAND t
